text: # Stocking Rate and DSE SR = 1.3 × (680 − 250)/25 farm_dse = SR × 1000 # Cattle Count cattle_dse = .35 × farm_dse cattle_count = cattle_dse / 15 # Sheep Count sheep_dse = .65 × farm_dse # Sheep count because 1 sheep = 1 DSE sheep_count = sheep_dse # Calculating Total Counts for Different Sheep ## Ratio pregnant_ewe_ratio = 1 rams_ratio = 0.01 weaners_ratio = 0.75 weathers_ratio = 0.75 / 2 22.36 22,360 7,826 521.7333 14,534 14,534 1 0.01 0.75 0.375 1.4 pregnant_ewes_dse = 1.4 rams_dse = 2 weaners_dse = 1.3 weathers_dse = 1 group_dse_individual = (pregnant_ewe_ratio × pregnant_ewes_dse) + (rams_ratio × rams_dse) + (weaners_ratio × weaners_dse) + (weathers_ratio × weathers_dse) ## Sheep Count number_of_sheep = sheep_dse / group_dse_individual pregnant_ewes = pregnant_ewe_ratio × number_of_sheep rams = rams_ratio × number_of_sheep weaners = weaners_ratio × 1.4 2 1.3 1 2.77 5,246.9314 5,246.9314 52.4693 3,935.1986 number_of_sheep weathers = weathers_ratio × number_of_sheep total_sheep_count = pregnant_ewes + rams + weaners + weathers # Winter DSE (Late pregnant) (pregnant_ewe_ratio × pregnant_ewes_dse × number_of_sheep) + (rams_ratio × rams_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weaners_ratio × weaners_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weathers_ratio × weathers_dse × number_of_sheep) # Spring DSE (Calving) pregnant_ewes_dse = 2.6 (pregnant_ewe_ratio × pregnant_ewes_dse × number_of_sheep) + 3,935.1986 1,967.5993 11,202.1986 14,534 2.6 (rams_ratio × rams_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weaners_ratio × weaners_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weathers_ratio × weathers_dse × number_of_sheep) # Summer DSE (Pregnant Ewes become dry) pregnant_ewes_dse = 1 (pregnant_ewe_ratio × pregnant_ewes_dse × number_of_sheep) + (rams_ratio × rams_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weaners_ratio × weaners_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weathers_ratio × weathers_dse × number_of_sheep) # Autumn DSE (Early Pregnant) pregnant_ewes_dse = 1 (pregnant_ewe_ratio × pregnant_ewes_dse × 20,830.3177 1 12,435.2274 1 number_of_sheep) + (rams_ratio × rams_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weaners_ratio × weaners_dse × number_of_sheep) + (weathers_ratio × weathers_dse × number_of_sheep) 12,435.2274
